February 01, 2002

 

Ranger’s Spell Correction

 

Firestrike's Description has been modified to show the Damage at 302dd (firebased).. just got to level 52 myself, and used the spell for the first time with that result.

Tonight, I’ve updated the Spell list to include new additions and updated information for Everquest:  Shadows of Luclin.

Luclin Fletching Update

 

I’ve updated the Arrow Smithing Charts with information reguarding the Acrylia Arrows, how to make, where to find materials, etc…

 

 

 

December 14, 2000

 

Luclin Bowery update

 

I’ve updated the Bowery Charts with more-accurate information on the stats of the new Shadewood Bows.  Take note that I am not a rich Elf, and have not been able to try every possible combination…  but, I have figured out the basic formulas to post a chart which I feel is reasonably reliable.

In our Bowery Charts you will find information on the new “Shadewood” Bows
